author: tng
msg: Some compilers (e.g. the HP compiler) has mistaken the parameter  'std', which is short for standalone as
the special prefix used by the standard libraries.  By Dean Roddey.

msg: [Bug 2365] Huge performance problem with the parser in XMLScanner::sendCharData() .  By David Bertoni.
